Package tiers

Class PurpleTier

java.lang.Object
display.Display
display.Tier
tiers.PurpleTier
public class PurpleTier
extends Tier
Represents the fourth level Tier, or the Purple Tier. It has VaccineClinics that need to be reopened with the help of Researchers.
Author:
Emily Tumacder

    • PurpleTier

      public PurpleTier​(double x, double y, double width, double height, int strokeWeight, java.awt.Color strokeColor, java.awt.Color fillColor, char playerMode)
      Sets up a PurpleTier with the given values, predecided Places, and randomly-created people
      Parameters:
      x - the top left corner x value
      y - the top left corner y value
      width - tier width
      height - tier height
      strokeWeight - strokeweight of lines
      strokeColor - strokecolor of lines
      fillColor - fill color of shapes
      playerMode - mode/accessories of the Player
